pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation of the Double-Entry Intraclass Correlation // The function computes the profile similarity measure double-entry intraclass correlation. It is a more precise index of the agreement of two empirically observed profiles than the often used intraclass correlation or profile correlation. In the case of score data with different scale formats, it is recommended to z-standardize the scores before entering into the function. For details, see Furr (2010) doi:10.1080/00223890903379134 or McCrae (2008) doi:10.1080/00223890701845104.
